questions.quote: That's always the first question with you. Why is that always your focus?
By the time I'm through with her mouth, she'll be able to eat off it. Is it safe to drink bleach if you dilute it?
"I'm very imPRESSED"? ... Ah you mean pressed caus' its like a dry cleaner?
I like history. Civil War. Maybe I could be a professor, or something.
Man, I gotta go lay down. You and George going out a little later?
So I'm curious. What'd you tell Mrs. Costanza that changed her mind?
I still don't understand what the problem is having her in the building.
Reckless endangerment of public safety, and violation of traffic code 342-A.
Huh, strawberries, anyone?  Ah, that's good. Ooh, juicy this time of year.
No, Jerry Lewis is gonna be at this Friar's Club roast I'm goin' to next week. Now I have an in to strike up a conversation with him.
